Welcome to Tvb-recon’s documentation!¶

Tvb-recon can be use for building a full brain network models from standard structural MR scans.

_For more examples and usage, please refer to the <http://docs.thevirtualbrain.org/>`_

For Developers¶

Development setup Debian Linux Users

For Developers.

Install git

$ su apt-get install -y git

Fork the source from github

$ git clone https://github.com/the-virtual-brain/tvb-recon.git

Create your feature branch

$ git checkout -b feature/fooBar

Commit your changes

$ git commit -am 'Add some comments'

Push to the branch

$ git push origin feature/fooBar

Create a new Pull Request.
